# Design Requirements - AI App Factory

## Mission Statement
**We build ASTOUNDING applications.** Every app generated by the AI App Factory must be visually stunning, functionally exceptional, and deliver a mind-blowing user experience that sets new standards for modern web applications.

## Core Design Philosophy: The 2035 Aesthetic

### Astounding Design Principles
1. **Dark Theme First**: Every application MUST prioritize dark mode as the primary design with exceptional polish
2. **Ultra-Minimalistic**: Maximum negative space, minimal visual elements, laser focus on content
3. **Breathtakingly Modern**: Design that feels like it's from the future (2035), not just current
4. **Subtle Sophistication**: Refined micro-interactions and tasteful animations
5. **Professional Excellence**: Every detail polished to perfection

## Mandatory Design Requirements

### Color System
```
PRIMARY PALETTE (Dark Mode First):
- Background Primary: #0A0A0B (near-black)
- Background Secondary: #18181B (charcoal)
- Background Tertiary: #27272A (dark gray)
- Text Primary: #FFFFFF (pure white)
- Text Secondary: #A1A1AA (muted gray)

ACCENT COLORS (ASTOUNDING Purple Theme):
- Primary Accent: #8B5CF6 (vibrant PURPLE - use for primary CTAs, BOLD choice!)
- Secondary Accent: #3B82F6 (royal blue - use for secondary accents)
- Tertiary Accent: #EC4899 (hot pink - use in gradients and highlights)

STATUS COLORS (Semantic Meaning - REQUIRED):
- Confirmed: #10B981 (emerald green)
- Completed: #3B82F6 (blue)
- Paid: #8B5CF6 (purple)
- Pending: #F59E0B (amber)
- Cancelled: #EF4444 (red)

GRADIENTS (For Hero Sections and Metrics):
- Hero: linear-gradient(135deg, #8B5CF6 0%, #EC4899 100%)
- CTA: linear-gradient(90deg, #8B5CF6 0%, #3B82F6 100%)
- Metric: linear-gradient(to right, #8B5CF6, #EC4899)

PHILOSOPHY:
- Purple (#8B5CF6) is the PRIMARY accent color
- Use status colors for semantic meaning (confirmed, pending, cancelled, etc.)
- Use gradients sparingly for hero CTAs and metric cards
- Ensure WCAG AAA contrast ratios (7:1 minimum)
```

### Typography
```
FONT HIERARCHY:
- Headings: Inter, Geist, or SF Pro Display (bold weights 700-900)
- Body: Inter or SF Pro Text (regular weight 400-500)
- Code: JetBrains Mono or SF Mono

SIZING (Mobile First):
- Hero: 48-72px (mobile) / 72-120px (desktop)
- H1: 36-48px (mobile) / 48-64px (desktop)
- H2: 28-36px (mobile) / 36-48px (desktop)
- Body: 16-18px with 1.6-1.8 line height
- Small: 14px minimum (accessibility)

PRINCIPLES:
- Bold, confident headings with massive size contrast
- Generous line-height for readability
- Letter-spacing: -0.02em for headings (tighter)
- Consistent modular scale (1.25 ratio)
```

### Layout & Spacing
```
SPACING SYSTEM (8px base):
- Micro: 4px (0.5rem)
- Small: 8px (1rem)
- Medium: 16px (2rem)
- Large: 32px (4rem)
- XL: 64px (8rem)
- XXL: 128px (16rem) - for hero sections

LAYOUT PRINCIPLES:
- Hero sections: Full viewport height with XXL padding
- Section spacing: Minimum XL (64px) between major sections
- Card padding: Large (32px) for breathing room
- Container max-width: 1280px with generous padding
- Use asymmetric grids (e.g., 2/3 + 1/3) for visual interest
```

### Visual Effects
```
GLASSMORPHISM:
.glass-card {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
}

SHADOWS (Dark Mode):
- Subtle: 0 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4)
- Medium: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)
- Large: 0 10px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)
- Glow: 0 0 20px rgba(accent-color, 0.2) - for hover states

GRADIENTS:
- Subtle dark gradients: from-gray-900 to-black
- Accent gradients: ONLY for hero CTAs
- Mesh gradients for backgrounds (very subtle)
```

### Micro-Interactions
```
ANIMATION TIMING:
- Instant feedback: 50-100ms
- Micro-interactions: 150-200ms
- Page transitions: 300-400ms
- Use spring easing for playful elements
- Use ease-out for professional transitions

HOVER STATES:
- Scale: hover:scale-[1.02] for cards
- Brightness: hover:brightness-110 for images
- Glow: hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(59,130,246,0.3)] for CTAs
- All with transition-all duration-200

REQUIRED INTERACTIONS:
- Button press: scale-[0.98] on active
- Card hover: subtle lift with shadow
- Link hover: underline or color change
- Form focus: glowing border
- Loading states: skeleton screens, not spinners
```

### Stock Photography & Media
```
UNSPLASH INTEGRATION:
- Hero backgrounds: https://source.unsplash.com/1920x1080/?modern,minimal,dark,abstract
- Feature cards: https://source.unsplash.com/800x600/?gradient,geometric,minimal
- Team photos: https://source.unsplash.com/400x400/?portrait,professional,headshot
- Product shots: https://source.unsplash.com/1200x800/?product,minimal,tech

GUIDELINES:
- Use dark, moody photography
- Abstract/geometric patterns preferred
- Avoid busy, cluttered images
- Ensure images don't compete with text
- Always add dark overlay for text readability
```

### Critical Component Patterns (MANDATORY)

**IMPORTANT**: These patterns are REQUIRED for specific scenarios. Implement exactly as specified.

**STATUS_BADGE** (CRITICAL):
For any entity with a status field, display a color-coded badge:
```tsx
// Confirmed bookings
<span className="inline-flex px-3 py-1.5 text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wide rounded-full bg-emerald-600 text-white">
  Confirmed
</span>

// Pending bookings
<span className="inline-flex px-3 py-1.5 text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wide rounded-full bg-amber-600 text-white">
  Pending
</span>

// Cancelled bookings
<span className="inline-flex px-3 py-1.5 text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wide rounded-full bg-red-600 text-white">
  Cancelled
</span>

// Completed bookings
<span className="inline-flex px-3 py-1.5 text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wide rounded-full bg-blue-600 text-white">
  Completed
</span>

// Paid bookings
<span className="inline-flex px-3 py-1.5 text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wide rounded-full bg-purple-600 text-white">
  Paid
</span>
```

**EMPTY_STATE** (CRITICAL):
For any list/grid that can be empty, show icon + message + CTA:
```tsx
<div className="flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-16 text-center">
  <CalendarIcon className="h-16 w-16 text-gray-600 mb-4" />
  <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold text-white mb-2">No bookings yet</h3>
  <p className="text-gray-400 mb-6">Start browsing chapels to create your first booking</p>
  <button className="bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-600 to-blue-600 text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-xl">
    Browse Chapels
  </button>
</div>
```

**TAB_NAVIGATION** (CRITICAL):
For detail pages with 3+ content sections:
```tsx
<div className="border-b border-white/10">
  <nav className="flex space-x-8">
    <button
      className="px-6 py-4 text-sm font-medium text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-300 data-[state=active]:text-white data-[state=active]:border-b-2 data-[state=active]:border-purple-600 data-[state=active]:font-semibold transition-colors duration-200"
      data-state="active"
    >
      Overview
    </button>
    <button className="px-6 py-4 text-sm font-medium text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-300 transition-colors duration-200">
      Details
    </button>
    <button className="px-6 py-4 text-sm font-medium text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-300 transition-colors duration-200">
      History
    </button>
  </nav>
</div>
```

**GRADIENT_METRIC_CARD** (CRITICAL):
For dashboard key metrics and countdowns:
```tsx
<div className="bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-600 to-pink-600 rounded-xl p-8 text-white shadow-lg">
  <div className="text-5xl font-bold mb-2">24 Days</div>
  <div className="text-lg opacity-90">Until your ceremony</div>
</div>
```

### Component Patterns
```
GLASS_CARD:
- Background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03)
- Backdrop filter: blur(20px)
- Border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05)
- Border-radius: 12-16px
- Generous internal padding (32px)
- Hover: slight scale (1.02) + glow effect

PRIMARY_CTA:
- Background: linear-gradient(90deg, #8B5CF6 0%, #3B82F6 100%)
- Text: white, font-semibold
- Padding: px-8 py-3
- Border-radius: rounded-xl
- Shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.3)
- Hover: brightness-110, scale-105
- Size: Minimum 44px height (accessibility)

SECONDARY_CTA:
- Background: transparent
- Border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)
- Text: white
- Hover: border color purple-600, background rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.1)

DARK_INPUT:
- Dark background with subtle borders
- Focus states with purple glow (ring-4 ring-purple-600/20)
- Floating labels or top labels
- Clear error states with red accent
- Success feedback with green accent

NAVIGATION:
- Fixed header with glass effect
- Minimal height (64-80px)
- Hidden on scroll down, visible on scroll up
- Mobile: Full-screen overlay menu

MODALS:
- Dark overlay (rgba(0,0,0,0.8))
- Centered with glass-card effect
- Smooth entry animation (scale + fade)
- Click outside to close
```

## Technical Requirements

### Mandatory Stack
- **CSS Framework**: Tailwind CSS v3.x (REQUIRED)
- **Component Library**: shadcn/ui (REQUIRED)
- **Icons**: Lucide React or Heroicons
- **Fonts**: Variable fonts from Google Fonts or system fonts
- **Images**: Unsplash API for all stock photography

### CSS Architecture
```css
/* Global styles MUST include */
:root {
  --background: 0 0% 4%; /* Near black */
  --foreground: 0 0% 98%; /* Near white */
}

body {
  @apply bg-background text-foreground antialiased;
}

/* Smooth scrolling */
html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

/* Remove focus outlines for mouse users */
:focus:not(:focus-visible) {
  outline: none;
}
```

### Performance Requirements
- Lighthouse score: 95+ for all metrics
- First Contentful Paint: < 1.5s
- Time to Interactive: < 3.5s
- Cumulative Layout Shift: < 0.1
- Lazy load all images below the fold

## Domain-Specific Adaptations

### For Business/SaaS Applications
- More conservative color palette
- Emphasis on data visualization
- Clean, professional typography
- Subtle animations only

### For Creative/Consumer Applications
- Bolder accent colors allowed
- More playful animations
- Larger typography contrasts
- Creative layout patterns

### For E-Commerce Applications
- Product-focused layouts
- High-quality product photography
- Clear CTAs with high contrast
- Trust indicators prominently displayed

## Accessibility Requirements
- WCAG AAA compliance (7:1 contrast minimum)
- Keyboard navigation for all interactions
- Screen reader optimized markup
- Reduced motion options respected
- Touch targets minimum 44x44px
- Focus indicators clearly visible

## The Astounding Factor

Every application MUST include at least THREE "wow" moments:

1. **The First Impression**: Hero section that immediately captivates
2. **The Delight Moment**: An unexpected animation or interaction that brings joy
3. **The Power Feature**: A UI element that showcases the app's core value brilliantly

Examples of Astounding Elements:
- Particle effects on hero CTA hover
- Smooth parallax scrolling effects
- Magnetic cursor effects on key elements
- Ambient animations (subtle, continuous)
- Progressive blur on scroll
- Text animations on viewport entry
- 3D transforms on card interactions

## Quality Checklist

Before any design is considered complete:
- [ ] Dark theme is stunning and primary
- [ ] Typography creates clear visual hierarchy
- [ ] Spacing feels generous and breathable
- [ ] Interactions feel smooth and responsive
- [ ] Colors are minimal but impactful
- [ ] Images are high-quality and relevant
- [ ] The overall effect is ASTOUNDING
- [ ] Accessibility standards are met
- [ ] Performance metrics are achieved
- [ ] The app feels like it's from 2035

## Remember

**We don't build good apps. We don't build great apps. We build ASTOUNDING apps.**

Every pixel matters. Every interaction counts. Every user should feel they're experiencing something extraordinary.

This is not just a design system - it's a commitment to excellence that defines the AI App Factory.
